Actions.Description: Create a new conversation in this group.

Actions.Description: Retrieve a list of attachments that belong to a post.

Actions.Description: Get a specific thread that belongs to a group.

Actions.Description: Retrieves the properties of a particular conversation.

Actions.Description: Retrieves a post in a specified thread.

Actions.Description: Get all the threads in a group conversation.

Actions.Description: Reply to a post and add a new post to the specified thread in a group conversation.
